title: can someone tell me why i cant submit my votes
body: Can someone{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}  tell me why i cant submit my votes for all stars 2016?

replies.body: You have to make sure you are on the same region you play on. Underneath your name it says the region you play on and under there again you can select another region. I had problems casting my votes before i realized i was on a different region. I play EU west and was Logged into NA in the All-Star casting system.
What error are you seeing when you try to submit? Can you [grab a screenshot](https://gyazo.com/) and show me what's going on?
